attributes.action: Sort the flooded foot path on powell ave Blackpool fy4
attributes.additional_details: Because it's hard to walk on the foot path with it being flooded. Having to walk on the road with children isn't ideal.
attributes.background: To prevent the foot path from flooding every time it rains

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
